title: Fiskars Student Scissors, Scissors for School, 7 Inch, 3 Pack,Red, Blue, Turquoise
description: Designed to put adult cutting performance into still-growing hands, Fiskars Student Scissors are larger than standard Kids Scissors but smaller than adult scissors, ideal for kids ages 12 and up. Their stainless steel blades are great for a variety of general cutting tasks, with a lasting edge and pointed tips for improved cutting precision. The handle accommodates both right- and left-handed users and features a larger finger loop and an ergonomic thumb loop for a natural, more comfortable fit.
